ZenCrypt changelog, information and open-source libraries.
Zencrypt is now fully open-source. You can view the code on Gitlab!
It looks like you have no files yet…\nClick \"+\" to start encrypting!

Welcome to ZenCrypt. With this app, you can safely encrypt files, using a secure and efficient library. Zencrypt offers AES-256 encryption algorithm, CBC mode of operations, block padding with PKCS7, computationally secure random salt (of cipher block size), password stretching with PBKDF2, random IV generation on each encryption (16 bytes), and password analysis for strength, crack times, weakness, etc using nulab\'s zxcvbn4j library. Finally, the application does not leak (tested with LeakCanary), and has no internet connection permission (except for google play billing library, which is required for purchasing pro version). You can check the encryption library\'s source code below. Credits go to Priyank Vasa (EasyCrypt) on github.

ZenCrypt v3.1
> Major code & design overhaul.
> New features implemented.
> Lots of bug fixes.
> You can encrypt/decrypt files from anywhere in your phone. Even cloud providers!
> ZenCrypt now complies with android 11\'s scoped storage. If you uninstall the app, ALL of your encrypted/decrypted files WILL BE deleted. You have been warned.
Due to this change, ZenCrypt can no longer store files in the devices\'s main storage. Many features have been crippled by this change, if you see something missing, that\'s why. Don\'t blame me, blame Google.
> Encryption and decryption speeds SIGNIFICANTLY improved.
> Encrypted file size SIGNIFICANTLY reduced.
> Library change, ZenCrypt now supports AES-256.
> Completely migrated to androidx.
> Proper support for android 10 & 11.
> Complete app re-write, now entirely written in Kotlin.
> Designed using coroutines, flow, jetpack compose.
> Dropped backwards compatibility with versions less than 3.0. This was a NECESSARY change.
> If you want to migrate your files to the new version, download ZenCrypt v2.5 from here, then decrypt them, and encrypt them with the new version.
> Due to the above, ZenCrypt now offers free UNLIMITED encryptions for everyone. Dark theme and fingerprint encryption still remain the only pro features.
> Users who already bought ZenCrypt pro in the past, do not have to purchase again. Go in the app settings, wait 2 seconds, then restart the app.
> Show changelog on every app update.
> Re-defined app exit to respect android\'s life cycle scope.
> Fix dark theme for MIUI devices.
> ZenCrypt went open-source.
Secure and efficient cryptography library for Android. EasyCrypt uses only secure implementations and all the known Crypto bugs are already dealt with properly.
A navigation bar widget inspired on Google Bottom Navigation mixed with Chips component.
